des: "This frosting is good for many types of cakes including carrot cakes, apple cakes, and spice cakes.  Add flavorings to compliment the cake you are frosting.  Try 1 1/2 teaspoons of grated lemon or orange rind, 1 teaspoon any extract, 1 teaspoon of liqueur, or a mashed banana."
ins:
Blend together the cream cheese and cream until light and fluffy.
Sift the sugar, and add to the cream cheese blend.
